PlaneSpotting: Technical Documentation¶

File loading and transfer¶

PlaneSpotting main¶

main.getArgs()[source]¶

defining the input parameters by the arguments.

src: https://pymotw.com/2/argparse/

Returns:args
Return type:argparse.Namespace
main.load_dump1090_file(file)[source]¶

The json from the input file is loaded here.

A new empty json structure gets initialised here and the raw data from the input file is plugged into this new json.

What is this new json structure: It contains all the keys to all possible data that
can be extracted using the decoder script. The decoder.py files fills up the keys in them.
Parameters:file (File Object) – JSON input file
Returns:JSON
Return type:dictionary
main.main(filename, output, latitude, longitude)[source]¶

The expected inputs to the filename parameter: Path to a file, path to a folder.

Parameters:
  • filename – The path to the folder/file which cotains the RAW ADS-B.
  • output – Output path
  • latitude – Latitude coordinate of the ground station
  • longitude – Longitude coordinate of the ground station
